abstract: From AAA to bad junk, in two easy steps
snippet: From AAA to bad junk, in two easy steps
lead_paragraph: Three weeks ago, something called “variable leveraged super senior certificates” issued by Foraois Funding Limited was rated Triple A by both Moody’s and Standard & Poor’s. Two weeks ago, both rating services cut the rating, to low investment grade at S.&P., and to high junk at Moody’s. This week, Moody’s went further, to Caa2, which is low junk. S.&P. has not yet followed.
